name: Warestack
tagline: Agentic guardrails for safe releases
description: Create your own release protection in plain English to flag or block team code changes, so you instantly know if everythingâ€™s on track or breaking the rules.

name: Kira.art
tagline: From simple words to consistent, professional art.
description: Kira is an AI agent for creativity. Describe your idea, get an image. Edit by talking. No prompts, no layers. Build for anyone with ideas, even if youâ€™ve never made art before. Try it, test it, break it. Just you and your imagination, in conversation ðŸ’«

name: Obsidian Bases
tagline: Turn any set of notes into a powerful database
description: Obsidian Bases let you turn any set of notes into a powerful database. With bases you can organize everything from projects to travel plans, reading lists, and more. You can filter your notes by properties and create dynamic formulas.

name: ChartDB v2
tagline: Database diagrams editor for teams
description: ChartDB instantly turns your database schema into a beautiful, editable ER diagram with a single query. Itâ€™s free, open-source, and built for developers - finally making database exploration and design intuitive and shareable. ðŸ‘‡ðŸ¤¯

name: Notte
tagline: Reliable Web Agents and Workflows
description: Notte is your one-stop shop for web browser automation. Rapidly build hybrid web agent workflows where traditional web scripts meet agentic steps. This makes web automation fast, reliable and affordable at scale.

name: Visla
tagline: All-in-One AI Video Production for Modern Teams
description: AI video creation is easy with Visla, which handles the storyboard, script, B-roll, voice-over, subtitles, and more. With collaborative features for asset management, editing, and review, your team can work together seamlessly to create amazing videos.

name: Moises AI Studio
tagline: Introducing the first instrument-based AI music model
description: Moises AI Studio generates stems using context-aware AI that analyses your audio, follows your timing and stays in sync with where your track is headed. This is the future of music production.

name: Chat Mode
tagline: You can now build text-only conversational agents
description: Create a new conversational AI agent with guided onboarding. Build intelligent voice agents with customizable personalities, tools, and capabilities.

name: Neuro (ADHD)
tagline: Your AI Personal Assistant for ADHD
description: Make living with ADHD 10x easier. Claudia can turn your chaotic thoughts into calm organization... just by speaking with your voice. Say hello to the new (and easier) way of living with ADHD.

name: Cosmo
tagline: Turn Screen Time into Skills Time.
description: Build real skills in just minutes a day. No videos. Just doing. Cosmo is your personal AI tutor, always ready with hands-on lessons that adapt to you. Whether you're between classes, commuting, or on a break, youâ€™ll make real progress in GenAI, tech, and more.

name: MemSync
tagline: Unified Memory for all of your apps
description: MemSync: Unified memory for all your AI apps. One click personalizes prompts across ChatGPT, Claude & more. Your context travels with you - no more cold starts. Privacy-first with E2E encryption. Install once, let every AI remember you.

name: Momentum for iOS
tagline: Photo habit tracker
description: Momentum is a photo habit tracker that helps you build routines and remember your progress. Every time you show up, take a picture. Momentum turns those moments into a visual timeline â€” and a recap youâ€™ll want to look back on.

name: Skope
tagline: The billing system for AI products.
description: Skope is the billing system for companies selling AI products. Itâ€™s the first to natively support outcome-based pricing and supports every standard pricing model (subscriptions, usage, hybrid, etc). Now, you can bill your customers exactly how you want to.

name: Roundtable
tagline: Proof of Human API
description: Roundtable's Proof of Human stops bots and fraud without slowing down real users. Score all your traffic in real-time, letting only verified humans pass through.

name: Amber
tagline: Whatsapp, Telegram, iMessage + AI + personal CRM
description: Effortlessly respond to your messages 2x as fast with more context than ever. Use WhatsApp, Telegram, and iMessage enabled by AI. Use split inboxes, setup up message scheduling & reminders. Never forget a single detail with a built-in personal CRM.

name: ClueoChat
tagline: Personalize your own AI model based on your terms
description: Give your AI a voice worth listening to. ClueoChat lets you customize personality, emotion, and tone into your AI.

name: Rebolt
tagline: Build AI-powered apps and agents, by speaking with AI
description: Rebolt allows everyone in the company to build AI-powered applications and agents by speaking with AI, batteries included. Integrate your systems, such as OpenAI, Outlook, OneDrive, or SharePoint, by mentioning them. Rebolt will use them in your apps.

name: Shockvue
tagline: The AI image editor â€” just say the words
description: Shockvue is the AI image editor that edits images like magic â€” just describe it. Speak your edits, remix photos, focus on specific zones, and get 4 variations at once. No overthinking. No pixel-pushing. Just instant visuals. âš¡ Try it free: shockvueapp.com

name: OmegaCloud.ai
tagline: Deploy AI apps instantly with a single shot
description: Run your AI apps instantly. No configs, no dashboards, no yaml - just code. Built for developers and researchers, OmegaCloud analyzes your code, auto-deploys databases, and powers AI with GPUs and built-in inference. Focus on creating, not configuring.

name: CoreViz
tagline: Organize, search and edit photos with AI
description: CoreViz is your visual co-pilot. Throw 1000+ images and videos at it, then ask it anything! At its simplest, CoreViz is a Google Photos for teams/orgs. At its fullest, it's a forensics expert, a radiologist and geospatial analyst â€“automating visual insight.
